topSentence: Your email, it's the only thing we ask you!
emailExplanation: We'll use it only to send you notification relative to your use of the application.

privacySentence: Your personnal data are never sent or selled to anyone and are only used for this application. According to the french low "Informatique et Libert√©s" and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, edit, delete and oppose your personnal data.
